mapper.update: update favorite_mark set favorite_group = #{favorite_group}, where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
mapper.delete: delete favorite_mark where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
mapper.select: select * from favorite_mark where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
select count(*) from favorite_mark where member_id = #{member_id} and exh_seq = #{exh_seq}
